case_description: Patient presented with high fever, headache, and nausea.
case_report: Patient was diagnosed with influenza. Treatment included antiviral medication and rest. Symptoms improved after 7 days.

case_description: Patient experienced chest pain and shortness of breath.
case_report: Patient was diagnosed with acute myocardial infarction. Immediate treatment included aspirin, thrombolytics, and a cardiac catheterization procedure. Patient was advised lifestyle changes.

case_description: Patient reported severe abdominal pain and vomiting.
case_report: Diagnosis indicated acute appendicitis. The patient underwent an appendectomy. Post-operative recovery was smooth with a follow-up scheduled.

case_description: Patient had a history of recurring migraines and visual disturbances.
case_report: The diagnosis was migraine with aura. Treatment included prescription of triptans and preventive medication. Patient was advised to manage triggers and follow-up.

case_description: Patient showed symptoms of persistent cough and wheezing.
case_report: Diagnosis pointed towards chronic bronchitis. Treatment included bronchodilators and corticosteroids. Patient was advised to avoid smoking and follow a respiratory physiotherapy regimen.
